course_description: Master Python fundamentals from scratch! This hands-on course teaches core programming concepts through real-world examples. Build confidence writing clean, functional code with no prior experience needed â€“ perfect for launching your tech career or automating daily tasks.
course_overview: This comprehensive course covers Python programming essentials through structured modules and practical projects. Learners start with installation and basic syntax, then progress through variables, data types, control structures (loops/conditionals), functions, error handling, and file operations. The curriculum emphasizes problem-solving through coding exercises, culminating in a capstone project where students build a functional script to solve a real-world problem. All concepts are reinforced with immediate application.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no coding background, career changers, students, and professionals seeking foundational programming skills for automation or data analysis.
learning_outcomes: Write syntactically correct Python programs using variables and core data types
Implement control flow structures to solve logic problems
Create reusable functions with parameters and return values
Debug code using print statements and error messages
Read from and write to text files using file I/O operations
